mapper.sql: SELECT t.real_name, t.description, t.per_img, GROUP_CONCAT( t2.role_name ) AS role_name, t3.grade_num, t4.major_name from sys_user t left join sys_user_role t1 on t1.user_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role t2 on t2.role_id = t1.role_id -- 左联角色表取得角色名称 left join zf_grade t3 on t3.grade_id = t.grade_id -- 左联年纪表取得年级 left join zf_major t4 on t4.major_id = t.major_id -- 左联专业表取得专业
